edu.soton.fpl.db

Class FootballWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.soton.fpl.db.FootballWorld

  • public class FootballWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all football world entities such as players, clubs, matches Some entities require a ViewingContext in order to view time-sensitive data. All times are stored in longs and defined as milliseconds since epoch.
    Author:
    Tim Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FootballWorld(edu.soton.fpl.db.generated.FplFactory oDb)
      Initialises the world using data from the specific database interface
